    • copyDeafultLangFile

      public void copyDeafultLangFile()
      Copy language files form plugin.jar/lang to datafolder/lang -从插件jar下的lang目录复制语言文件到数据目录

    • copyDeafultLangFile

      public void copyDeafultLangFile(File folder)
      Copy language files form plugin.jar/lang to target folder -从插件jar下的lang目录复制语言文件到指定目录
      参数:
      folder - Target folder. - 目标目录

    • loadLanguages

      public void loadLanguages()
      Load language files from datafolder,so you must copy language files first. - 从数据目录加载语言文件到内存,所以你必须先复制语言文件到数据目录

    • loadLanguages

      public void loadLanguages(File folder)
      Load language files from target folder,so you must copy language files first. - 从指定目录加载语言文件到内存,所以你必须先复制语言文件到该目录
      参数:
      folder - Target folder. - 目标目录

    • get

      public String get(Locale locale, String key)
      get language String from a locale. - 从一个locale获取语言字符串
      参数:
      locale - Taget language -目标语言
      key - language String key -目标字符串key

    • get

      public String get(org.bukkit.entity.Player player, String key)

      参数:
      player - Player that get language -得到语言的玩家
      key - language String key -目标字符串key

      public void broadcastMessage(org.bukkit.Server server, String key)
      Broadcast message with language. - 从语言文件广播消息
      参数:
      server - Broadcast server -要广播的服务器
      key - Language String key. -语言字符串的key

    • broadcastMessage

      public void broadcastMessage(org.bukkit.World world, String key)
      Broadcast message with language. - 从语言文件广播消息
      参数:
      world - Broadcast world -要广播的世界
      key - Language String key. -语言字符串的key

    • broadcastMessage

      public void broadcastMessage(List<org.bukkit.entity.Player> players, String key)
      Broadcast message with language. - 从语言文件广播消息
      参数:
      players - Players to broadcast -要广播的玩家列表
      key - Language String key. -语言字符串的key

    • get

      public String get(String key)
      get String with key by default language.. - 以默认语言得到String
      参数:
      key - Language String key. -语言字符串的key

    • sendMessage

      public void sendMessage(org.bukkit.command.CommandSender target, String key)
      Send a language message to target - 发送语言消息至目标
      参数:
      target - send target. - 发送目标
      key - language key. - 语言key

    • sendColoredMessage

      public void sendColoredMessage(org.bukkit.command.CommandSender target, String key, char color_char)
      Send a language message to target - 发送带颜色的语言消息至目标
      参数:
      target - send target. - 发送目标
      key - language key. - 语言key
      color_char - char to translate. - 用于替换字节符的字符
